abstract: Facebook opened up its service Monday to allow independent companies to create programs that interact with streams of information on the social network.
snippet: Facebook opened up its service Monday to allow independent companies to create programs that interact with streams of information on the social network.
lead_paragraph: On Monday, it was Facebook’s turn to make a move in its evolving chess match with Twitter, the rapidly growing micro-blogging service.

headline.main: Facebook Lets Others Tap Its Information Stream
